title: The Consumer game
creator_credit: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited and Pyramid Films
brief_description: Reviews psychological and motivational techniques used to sell a product. Explains the concepts of comparison shopping, unit pricing, convenient packaging, financing, guarantees and labels. Hosted by Artie Johnston.
creator_credit_for_label: Noel Nosseck, Directions Unlimited and Pyramid Films
